desc.p: A token helper for C style floating point numbers.
This helper applies if the initial char is a decimal char or a decimal point.
desc.pre: Grammar the number part is given by Integer . Integer [Exponent] or . Integer [Exponent] or Integer Exponent where Exponent is (case doesnt matter) "E" [ Sign ] Integer the number can be followed by (case doesnt matter) "f" for float "d" for double "L" for long double
